column4: i am a serious newb to linux/ubuntu and need some help with video drivers?

hi... i installed ubuntu on one computer and then transported the hard drive to another.. now i dont boot into the graphical interface, i just get a command line. i am a complete newb to linux/ubuntu and i am guessing that it is an issue with my video card? i would really like to get it working, if anyone can help
